name: Bouncing Ball Bomb
description:
Use the cannon to shoot the bombs against geometry objects and take them out of the dash. Aim the cannon by moving your finger across the screen. It increases firepower while holding down the shutter button.

The mechanics of this game is based on physics and geometry over the dash and offers many levels and many hours of play. To pass each level takes skill and logic.

You can shoot a bomb on an object, or several bombs that explode when hitting each other, driving the dash many figures.

Use your imagination to combine the explosions. You have limited bullets and many geometry to destroy.

Features
* It's free
* Many levels to overcome various dash boards
* Game precision, various configurations of geometric figures
* Fluid 3D graphics
* Overcoming addictive game
* Pure geometry to be destroyed
* The impact with an atomic bomb to empty the entire dash
